lead_paragraph: WAMSLER--Karl M.F. The Trustees and Staff of The New York Botanical Garden wish to record their great sadness at the death of Karl M.F. Wamsler. Karl was a distinguished scientist and businessman and lived in Pocking, Germany, near Munich. He was the father of five daughters, including Caroline A. Wamsler, Ph.D., Chairman of the Education and Nominating Committees of the Board of this institution. Karl's late wife Honore was a long-term Vice Chairman of the Board. Karl participated in many aspects of the life of NYBG, and we will truly miss his acute intelligence, charm, and joie de vivre. He and Honore were greatly valued friends. Our most sincere condolences to his daughters and their families. Maureen K. Chilton, Chairman; Gregory Long, The William C. Steere Sr. President 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  WAMSLER, KARL M.F
